title.rendered: The Ultimate Agency Guide to Video Marketing

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573234070290{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Plus tips & tricks to make it easy and affordable

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1520609118739{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]As people are presented with more and more content, it gets harder to cut through all the noise. The key is to know what types of content work best, and how to get that content front and center for your audience.

In this issue of Agency Perspectives, you’ll learn:

  • How to boost engagement and deliver results with video.
  • Actionable tips to multiply your video subscribers.
  • Tricks to optimize your video strategy with lead scoring, personas and other automation features.

[/vc_column_text]

Travis Simpson

Symbolscape Media

“Video has repeatedly proven to be a star performer among content formats. There’s something about video that just works. The combination of audible and visual media elicits our greatest sensory engagement.”

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.
